p: SEO and TEO were obtained from dried plants by hydrodistillation using a Clevenger equipment. 300 g of plant material was introduced into the apparatus with 3000 mL tap water. The mixture was heating to the evaporation temperature of the oil. The extraction time is considered after the complete distillation of the oil and the recovered of another 500 mL of flavored water. The obtained EOs was kept at 2–4 °C in dark conditions until their using for in vitro and in vivo experiments.
